SWADESPICE.SettingHint-LeftBarBGColour: The background colour of the left bar on the sheet, where derived stats are.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-LeftBarBGImage: The background image of the left bar on the sheet, where derived stats are.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-LeftBarLogo: The Logo that appears on the top left of the sheet.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-LeftBarHealthText: The text colour for Wounds and Fatigue on the left bar.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-LeftBarStatusText: The text colour for status effects (i.e. Shaken).
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-LeftBarDerivedNam: The text colour for the headings under derived stats.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-LeftBarDerivedVal: The text colour for the actual derived stats.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-LeftBarDerivedMod: The text colour for the modifiers of derived stats (i.e. Armor).
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-TopBarColour: The background colour of the top bar on the sheet, where the name is.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-TopBarBGImage: The background image of the top bar on the sheet, where the name is.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-CharnameTextColou: The colour of the characters name. This also affects Race, Rank and Advances.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-BodyBGColour: The background colour of the main body on the sheet, where you find the tabs and their content.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-BodyBGImage: The background image of the main body on the sheet, where you find the tabs and their content.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-CheckboxColour: The background colour of unchecked (deactivated) checkboxes.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-CheckboxColourChe: The background colour of checked (activated) checkboxes.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-CheckmarkColour: The colour of checkmarks in checked (activated) checkboxes.
SWADESPICE.SettingHint-CheckmarkColourFo: The background colour of checkboxes when they have focus (whilst being clicked, before the button is released).
SWADESPICE.ThemeHint: Here you can load a predefined theme.
SWADESPICE.CustomSheetHint: Click this button to customize all aspects of the sheet.
SWADESPICE.ImportWarning: WARNING: Your current settings will be overwritten!
SWADESPICE.ImportHint: Select a json file to import:
SWADESPICE.CompactModeHint: Compact Mode reduces the hight of the top bar (header) to make more space for the sheets tabs. As a result this decreases the size of the actor image preview. The actor image in the bio tab is unaffected.
